alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Trempealeau (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 08 at 6:59AM CST until March 10 at 3:00AM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Trempealeau River at Dodge affecting Trempealeau and Buffalo Counties. For the Trempealeau River...including Arcadia, Dodge...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Trempealeau River at Dodge. * WHEN...From this afternoon to early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 9.5 feet, The entrance road to the Trempealeau National Wildlife Refuge is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 AM CST Tuesday the stage was 10.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 10.7 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 10.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse.
